name: Socket

properties.name: host
properties.description: The name of the remote computer when a connection is established.

properties.name: encoding
properties.description: Sets or retrieves the name of the encoding used to transmit data.

properties.name: error
properties.description: A message describing the most recent error. Setting this value clears any error message.

properties.name: eof
properties.description: When true, the receive buffer is empty.

properties.name: connected
properties.description: When true, the connection is active.
The timeout in seconds to be applied to read or write operations.
properties.name: timeout

methods.name: open
methods.description: Opens the connection for subsequent read/write operations.

parameters.description: The encoding to be used for the connection
parameters.name: encoding

methods.name: listen
methods.description: Instructs the object to start listening for an incoming connection.

parameters.name: port
parameters.description: The TCP/IP port number to listen on.
The encoding to be used for the connection
parameters.name: encoding

methods.name: read
methods.description: Reads up to the specified number of characters from the connection. CR characters are ignored unless the encoding is set to "BINARY".

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of characters to read.

methods.name: readln
methods.description: Reads one line of text up to the next line feed.

methods.name: write
methods.description: Concatenates all arguments into a single string and writes that string to the connection.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Any number of string values. All arguments are concatenated to form the string to be written. CRLF sequences are converted to LFs unless the encoding is set to "BINARY".

methods.name: writeln
methods.description: Concatenates all arguments into a single string, appends a LF character, and writes that string to the connection.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Any number of string values. All arguments are concatenated to form the string to be written. CRLF sequences are converted to LFs unless the encoding is set to "BINARY".

methods.name: poll
methods.description: Checks a listening object for a new incoming connection.

description: Creates a TCP/IP connection, or establishes a TCP/IP server.
